name: RoundGlass
description: Roundglass Living, offers personalized support to help anyone reach their wellbeing goals. Roundglass Giving encompasses a diverse set of ventures that share a common purpose: empowering individuals, enriching communities, and preserving a thriving planet. Looking to empower wellbeing in your workplace? We offer custom, data-driven solutions to support your employees, customers, and community.
Headline: Where Wellbeing Meets the World
ShortDescription: Roundglass Living empowers with wellness solutions for healthier habits and life transformations

Highlights.name: A complete wellbeing toolkit
Highlights.description: Breathwork, meditation, yoga, food and music.

Highlights.name: Personalized for your goals
Highlights.description: Better sleep, less stress, and more.

Highlights.name: Real-time insights
Highlights.description: Track your progress and get nudges to ensure you see results.

enhanced_description: RoundGlass offers a comprehensive wellbeing platform, primarily through its 'Roundglass Living' service, designed to help individuals and organizations achieve their wellbeing goals. For workplaces, it provides custom, data-driven solutions aimed at supporting employees, customers, and the community to improve employee happiness and engagement. The platform features a complete wellbeing toolkit that includes breathwork, meditation, yoga, food guidance, and music. Solutions are personalized for individual goals such as better sleep and stress reduction, and the system offers real-time insights with progress tracking and nudges to ensure results and foster healthier habits.
key_use_cases: Personalized wellbeing goal achievement for employees
competitive_advantages: Custom, data-driven wellbeing solutions tailored for workplaces
Comprehensive wellbeing toolkit including breathwork, meditation, yoga, food, and music
Personalized support for individual wellbeing goals
Real-time insights and progress tracking with nudges for results
